column5: Got up to Lac Seul for the first time a few days ago. Went with some friends and their uncle from Edmonton. Wanted to show him the lac Seul walleye experience...hmmmmmmm....took 4 hours to land the first fish....that has never happened before. heard reports from all over of the same experience last week. Some of the fish we caught when they eventually decided to bite were very skinny, also heard reports of this from all areas of the lake, hope its just the hot weather/low water.

Its been an odd summer so far. No fish in the morning, then hit a hot spot and land 13 in an hour or two, then not even a bite the next day in the same spot. I can't figure it out. Hopefully its just a phase for now.  Glad you got into a few of them.
Everything is behind this year at least a few weeks.
love that lake for eyes..May have to make another trip up there next year  The new boat goes at a good clip with 4 in it eh? No bugs in this show either?  Must have taken a workday to upload that one
Your friend holding that rod . Here’s how you teach em.
